Teltoli sends out another fireball, surprised by her actions as she 
never knew how to do this before, and the sheer heat of it causes 
most of the bullets to melt, but six still get through, four scraping 
her left arm and two whizzing right through. The fireball still 
carries on in Godfather's direction, and she sends to missiles after 
it.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Alloran2@a... wrote:
> :::Godfather:::
> 
> ::He gets hit by the fireball::
> Godfather: UHHHH!
> ::he recovers::
> Godfather: Thats it, your gettin whacked for that!
> ::He takes out his other pistol and fires 15 shots from each of 
them.  thats 
> 30 bullets headed for Teltoli::
